name: EcovacsAirbot
0:
”Alexa, ask AIRBOT to start purifying.”
”Alexa, ask AIRBOT to stop purifying.”
”Alexa, ask AIRBOT to return to dock.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Purifying your house has never been easier than it is now! The AIRBOT allows you to purify your house without lifting a finger! 
To get started, make sure you have an ECOVACS account registered in the ECOVACS App and your AIRBOT is connected and online. Then, you just need to enable the ECOVACS Airbot skill by clicking on the "Enable" button. Once you’re all set up, simply give your AIRBOT a command and it’ll take care of the rest. 
Below are some of the voice commands you can use to control what your AIRBOT does in your home. Your AIRBOT will start, stop, give updates, and dock.
 
START
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to start purifying."
- "Alexa, turn on air purifier"
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to start purifying with Kitty."
 
STOP
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to stop purifying."
- "Alexa, turn off air purifier"
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to stop purifying with Kitty."

PAUSE
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to pause purifying."
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to pause purifying with Kitty."

RESUME
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to resume purifying."
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to resume purifying with Kitty."
 
STATUS
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT what’s its status?"
- "Alexa, tell AIRBOT I haven’t heard from it in a while"
 
DOCK
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to return to dock."
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to return to the charging dock."
- "Alexa, ask AIRBOT to start charging with Kitty."

*"Kitty" is the sample custom robot name, which means you can rename your Airbot, and control it with the new name through Alexa.
 
For more information about how AIRBOT connected works with Alexa, go to https://www.ecovacs.com.
